issue.title: A new pricing data tree is saved on every order 'save' (draft)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

A new pricing data tree is saved on every order 'save' (draft).
This creates incoherent data in DB and makes the REST extraction service crash !

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Seems to work ! Thanks Hélène !
